info.name: Pecunia-Admin - extras
info.description:
Pecunia Admin APIs for the dashboard.
It has 2 major actors
- Organization Admin: View and modify things within the organization
- Platform Admin: View across multiple organizations but should not be able to modify things in other organization.

exec: pm.test("Set Kredi Admin Token value", function () {

request.description:
Logs in an admin user


## Payload
`email`: `required` email address
`password`: `required` if password is not sent.

    }
}
